mapper.sql: a.id, a.codes, a.type, a.typen, a.name, a.len, a.code_id AS "codeId", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks, a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM drs_item a
WHERE a.del_flag = 0
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.name},'%')
AND a.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.code},'%')
AND a.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.type},'%')
ORDER BY a.id DESC
